name: GRIDDy (EverlastingBuffoon)
description: A tile based high-score "roguelike" with simple turn-based movement on a procedurally generated  grid where you are a square. Clear each stage by defeating the other shapes and proceed to the next level. Attempt to reach a high score and keep your combo up by playing fast. But don't get too greedy, as you can only make one mistake on each dive through... the GRIDD.
